378b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni 'dus byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te 'dus byas su gtogs par gyur na ni//
378b7(mdo sde): byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dus ma byas su gtogs par gyur na ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bus
379a1(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te khyod 'dus byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin na/ khyod ji ltar shes par bya/ 'jam
379a2(mdo sde): dpal gyi smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa 'dus byas su gtogs sA ma/ 'on te 'dus ma byas gtogs/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
379a3(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa ni 'dus byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas
379a4(mdo sde): sprul pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar kho bo shes par gyis shig/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas/ gzugs la gnas
379a5(mdo sde): sam/ smras pa ma yin no// smras pa de'i ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la gnas sam/ smras pa ma yin no// smras pa de ci 'du byas la gnas sam/ smra ba ma yin no// /
379a6(mdo sde): smras pa de ci 'dus ma byas la gnas sam/ smras pa ma yin no// smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas/ smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
379a7(mdo sde): shes pa ni gang la yang mi gnas so/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas pa de la kho bo gnas par shes par bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/
379b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin nyid kyi 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa gang yin pa de nyid kho bo'i 'gro ba nyid de bzhin
379b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i 'gro ba ste/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de bzhin nyid ji lta bar kho bo yang de ltar 'ongs pas/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de bzhin nyid ji lta bar kho bo
379b3(mdo sde): yang de ltar gnas te/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// lha'i bu 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'di ni/ de bzhin nyid ci 'dra ba de 'dra ste/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de bzhin/
379b4(mdo sde): nyid sems med cing zhi pa'i phyir/ 'jam dpal yang sems med cing zhi ba ste/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid gang du btsal bar
379b5(mdo sde): bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin nyid ni lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis rnams su btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis po rnams gang
379b6(mdo sde): du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can gyis rnam par grol ba las btsal bar bya'o//
379b7(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba ni sems can
380a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang
380a2(mdo sde): bsam pa gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi yul du'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gang du btsal bar bya/
380a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa thams cad shes pa las btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji
380a4(mdo sde): ltar 'dir shes pa nyung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni sus kyang / kun shes pa 'am/ rnam par shes par mi nus
380a5(mdo sde): so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni chags pa med pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ brjod du med pa/ bsnyad du med pa/ sbyor ba med pa/ tshig med pa/ sems
380a6(mdo sde): dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba ste/ de sus kyang kun shes par ram/ rnam par shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te/ sangs
380a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi ye shes kun shes par bya ba ma yin na/ nyan thos 'di dag gis kun shes par ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par ga la 'gyur//
380b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang yi ge rnams kyis ye shes de bstan pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs te/ ye shes de ni yi ge med pa'o// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper
380b2(mdo sde): name gtsubs pa las me mi 'byung gi/ gtsub shing gtsubs pa las me 'byung ba de bzhin du/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas gal te thog ma kho nar/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya cher yang
380b3(mdo sde): dag par rab tu bstan na/ sems can gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de/ kun shes par mi 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gtsub shing gi gtam gyis/ ye shes de
380b4(mdo sde): bstan te/ ye shes de ni yi ge med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gtsub shing gi gtam gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang ci yang rung ste/ sdom pa dang / yo byad
380b5(mdo sde): bsnyungs pa'i gtam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i gtam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la 'jug pa'i gtam 'di ni gtsub shing gi gtam zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
380b6(mdo sde): gtsub shing gi gtam ma yin pa'i gtam gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gtam gang skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa'i gtam ma yin pa dang / 'dren pa dang / sel ba'i
380b7(mdo sde): gtam ma yin pa dang / gtam gang kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su brjod pa'i gtam ma yin pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phan yon gyi gtam ma yin pa dang / gtam gang 'khor ba la yid 'byung
381a1(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i gtam ma yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i gtam dang / gtam gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ma yin//
381a2(mdo sde): spang bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / gtam gang thob par bya ba'i phyir mA yin mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i
381a3(mdo sde): phyir ma yin pa 'di ni lha'i bu dag pa/ snying po yod pa'i gtam mo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gtam 'di lta bu rjod pa'i tshe/ mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir/ bdud
381a4(mdo sde): sdig can 'dir mi 'ong ba ngo mtshar ro/ / tshig de smras nas/ ring por ma lon pa de'i mod la bdud sdig to can/ steng gi bar snang la sprin chen po 'khrugs par mngon par sprul nas/ sba
381a5(mdo sde): chen po rang ro phyung ba dang / des thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de dang ngas skrag nas/ sgra skad kyi nga ro 'di lta bu 'di su zhig gis snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzem dpal
381a6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis bdud sdig can gyi 'gyur ba mthong ngam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar
381a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong lags so/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pas/ de'i tshe bdud sdig to can bcing bdam pos bcings te/ sa'i steng du ltung ba de lta bu'i bsam pa bsam pa dang /
381b1(mdo sde): bdag ni bcang ba dam pos bcing so// bdag ni bcing ba dam pos bcing so zhes sgra 'byin to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can bcing ba 'dri bas ches dam po'i 'ching ba gzhan yod de/ des khyod rtag tu bcings kyang khyod
381b2(mdo sde): kyis khong du ma chud do/ / de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'ching ba dang / phyin ci log gi 'ching ba dang / sred pa dang / lta ba'i bcings pa ste/ sdig can 'di ni
381b3(mdo sde): 'ching ba 'di bas ches dam pa'i 'ching ba dam po gzhan yin te/ des khyod rtag tu bcings kyang / khong du ma chud do// bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal thong shig dang / bdag gi gnas
381b4(mdo sde): su 'gro'o/ / yang 'dud kyi las mi bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa sdig can/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa khyod kyis bya dgos na/ khyod ci'i phyir btang / bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam
381b5(mdo sde): dpal bdud bdag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji ltar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can gang sang
381b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud byed du gzhugs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang / shes rab kyi shes pa rnam par sprul pa'o// gang sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
381b7(mdo sde): pa mdzad pa 'di ni/ rab tu ngo mtshar ma yin te/ gang bdud sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang / byed pa 'di ni/ rab tu ngo mtshar to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe
382a1(mdo sde): gang sdug can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs
382a2(mdo sde): de lta bu byin gyi rlabs so/ / de nas bdud sdig can gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci 'dod pa kho bo la dris shig dang / kho bos dris pa lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rlangs par bya'o zhes tshig
382a3(mdo sde): de skad smras so/ / de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba gang yin/ bdud kyis smras
382a4(mdo sde): pa btsun pa 'od srungs chen po/ / bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar byed pa ni dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba'o// zhi gnas de la chags pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med mi
382a5(mdo sde): skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid la snying por 'du shes pa dang / lta bar song ba rnams la bsal bar 'du shes pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la snying por 'du shes pa
382a6(mdo sde): dang mtshan ma rnams la bsal bar 'du shes pa dang / smon pa med pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang / smon lam la bsal bar 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la snying por
382a7(mdo sde): 'du shes pa dang / 'khor ba la bsal bar 'du shes pa 'di dag ni/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa 'od srung
382b1(mdo sde): chen po lta bar song ba bsal nas/ stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ lta bar song ba nyid stong pa nyid do// mtshan ma bsal nas/ mtshan ma med pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/
382b2(mdo sde): mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma med pa'o// smon lam bsal nas/ smon pa med pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ smon lam gyi ngo bo nyid smon pa med pa'o// 'khor ba bsal nas/ mya ngan
382b3(mdo sde): las 'das pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyis/ 'khor bar dmigs pa nyid mya ngan 'das pa'o// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'du shes dang / rlom sems
382b4(mdo sde): dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa thams cad la mi spyod pa ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / zad pa las ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa nyid mya ngan las 'dra/
382b5(mdo sde): pa'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad
382b6(mdo sde): ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa dag sus btul/ dge slong de dag gis smras pa/ gang thob pa yang med la/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang med pas so// rab 'byor gyis smras
382b7(mdo sde): pabar btul ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ ji ltar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir/ chung zad kyang khrid pa yang med/ mkhrid pa yang med de/ ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du shes pa dang / bskyed pa yang med/ bkag
383a1(mdo sde): pa yang med de/ mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ltar bdag cag btul to// dge slong de dag gis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu stong nyis brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig
383a2(mdo sde): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis/ gzhan yang bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can ji ltar na dge sbyong sbyin gnas yin/ bdud kyi/
383a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nam dge slong len pa yang med de/ nod pa yang med la/ dad cing dang ba thams cad las kyang yongs su spyod pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gang dge slong gang la byin
383a4(mdo sde): pa de la sgyu ma'i blo dang / gang len pa de la mig yor gyi blo dang / nye bar len pa'i sems dang / nye bar len pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang / yongs su mi spyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu ni sbyin gnas
383a5(mdo sde): yin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'khrugs pa med par gsungs pa gang yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin
383a6(mdo sde): gang la rten nas/ shin tu zad pa'i phyir/ zad pa yang zad par mi byed/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ ma skyes pa yang mi spyad/ myong ba med pa yang myong bar mi byed de/ chos thams cad
383a7(mdo sde): kyang rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par shes la/ shes nas kyang tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug cing / mnyam par yang mthong la/ chung zad
383b1(mdo sde): kyang mthong ba yang med/ mi mthong ba yang med pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'khrugs pa med par gsungs pa'o// mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar na/
383b2(mdo sde): dge slong sems thams cad la dbang thob pa yin/ bdud kyis smras pa btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po// nam dge slong chos thams cad la sems rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid du shes
383b3(mdo sde): la/ rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid la mngon zhen pa yang med cing / sems gzod ma nas rnam par grol ba shes la/ 'ching bar yang mi byed/ grol bar yang mi byed/ sems gzug
383b4(mdo sde): med pas/ chos thams cad gzugs med par shes/ sems gnas pa med pas/ chos thams cad gnas pa med par mthong / sems 'dzin pa med par chos thams cad 'dzin pa med/
383b5(mdo sde): par shes kyang / sems kyis sems shes pa yang med la/ sems kyi ngo bo nyid rang bzhin gyis/ chos thams cad kyi chos dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin yang shes shing
383b6(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par dbang thob pa ni mos pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa yin te/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dge slong de
383b7(mdo sde): lta bu ni sems thams cad la dbang thob pa yin no/ / gang pos smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar na dge slong yongs su dag par chos ston pa yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po/
384a1(mdo sde): nam dge slong gi gzhan las chos thams shes kyang / gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa'i sems la mngon par zhen pa yang med/ chos thams cad kyang sgro btags par yang
384a2(mdo sde): ston/ yi ge dang skad dang dbyangs dang / tshig gi lam thams cad brag cha lta bur shes/ chos nyan pa thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bur mthong / gang gi lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyang chu zla dang
384a3(mdo sde): 'dra bar mthong / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yongs su rtogs pa las byung bar shes/ chos 'ga' zhag gzung ba'i phyir ram/ dor ba'i phyir ram/ shin tu bzlas pa'i phyir ram
384a4(mdo sde): thob par bya ba'i phyir yang chos ma ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po rnams la yang dbang thob cing legs so zhes bya ba la yang re ba med la/ zung zad med par chos ston cing / rang gi/
384a5(mdo sde): sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi yongs su dag par shes te/ sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag par shes nas/ phung
384a6(mdo sde): bo'i bdud la dben par mthong ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud la bcos mar 'du shes pa dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud la ma skyes pa dang / mi skye bar gnas pa dang / lha'i bu bdud la g.yo
384a7(mdo sde): bdang / rlob sems thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa yin te/ dge slong de lta bu ni yongs su dag par chos ston pa yin no// nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar na dge slong 'du
384b1(mdo sde): ba 'dzin pa yin/ bdud kyis spras pa/ btsun pa nye bar 'khor/ dge slong gis na ma chos thams cad shin tu dul bar shes te/ nyes pa rnams kyi thog ma'i sngon gyi mtha' yang dben pa'i
384b2(mdo sde): mthar shes te/ nyes pa byung ba rnams kyi 'gyod pa yang sel cing / dam por mi byed de/ de dag la gang gis mtshams med pa rnams kyang rnam par gnon na/ cho ga dang tshul khrims la log par
384b3(mdo sde): zhugs pa phran tshegs lta smos kyang ci dgos pa/ de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa yang nye bar bsgrub/ nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la yang mkhas/ blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa la yang kun nas nyon
384b4(mdo sde): mongs par gyur pa ma yin pa dang 'byung bar 'du shes/ nyon mongs par nang du yang mi ston te/ phyi rol du yang ma yin/ gnyis ka med par yang ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa khong du chud pa nyid
384b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med par shes shing / nyon mongs pa yang mi sel/ nyon mongs pa yang med pa yang mi bsgrub/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang sprin dang / char smin 'dra bar shes te/ ye shes
384b6(mdo sde): dang lhag mthong gi rlung gis gtor nas/ phyogs dang yul du 'gro ba yang med gnas pa yang med pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni chu zla dang 'dra ste/ yongs su rtogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi//
384b7(mdo sde): bzhin nye bar ston pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni mun pa'i spyod yul te/ shes rab kyi sgron mas mi snang ba snang bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni chom rkun dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang /
385a1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang 'dra ste/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pas brtag na gnas pa ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni glags tshol ba ste/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid
385a2(mdo sde): la byed pas 'phel ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i shes pas yid la 'jug par mi byed pas/ sus kyang nyon mongs pa rnams 'di 'dra bar shes te//
385a3(mdo sde): sems can nyon mongs pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje zhing bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa mngon sum du gyur pa na 'dul ba 'dzin pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o//
385a4(mdo sde): de ltar nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyis/ rangab rang gi 'dod pa bdud sdig can de la kun dris nas/ bdud sdig can gyis kyang de dag thams cad kyi don gtan la bab pa bstan pas sems rangs
385a5(mdo sde): par gyur to/ / de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bdud sdig can de la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
385a6(mdo sde): pas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bdud kyi las bshad zin gyis/ khyod kyang spobs par gyis shig/ sdig can byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang yin
385a7(mdo sde): de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud sdig can gyis lha'i bu mtshams bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// nyi shu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul
385b1(mdo sde): yan no/ / nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor spyod pa/ rnam par grol ba 'dod cing / 'khor bas skrag pa rnams la snyen pa dang / sten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi
385b2(mdo sde): las so/ / stong pa nyid la so sor rtog cing / sems can yal bar 'dor ba yang bdud gyi las so// 'dus ma byas la so sor rtog cing / 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su skyo
385b3(mdo sde): ba yang bdud gyi las so/ / bsam gtan skyed cing / bsam gtan las rnam par ldog pa tshol ba yang bdud kyi las so// chos ston kyang chos nyan pa rnams la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa yang
385b4(mdo sde): bdud kyi las so/ / yon tan dang ldan pa dang / sprin gnas tshol zhing / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khro ba yang bdud kyi las so// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ston cing
385b5(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chab pa yang bdud kyi las so/ / zab mo'i gtam 'chab cing gtam sna tshogs ston pa yang 'dud kyi las so// byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes kyang / pha rol
385b6(mdo sde): tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba yang 'dud kyi las so/ / rab tu rtson pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang / sems can gyi brtson pa rnams mngon par mi sbyor ba yang bdud kyi las so// dge
385b7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba srog kyang byang chub kyi sems mngon du mi byed pa yang bdud kyi las so/ / lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor dang ldan par gnas kyang / sems can rnams lhag mthong yang dag par 'dzin du mi
386a1(mdo sde): 'jug pa yang bdud kyi las so/ / nyon mongs pa ma lus par zad par tshol zhing / 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis nyon mongs pa rnams la smon pa'ang 'dud kyi las so// shes
386a2(mdo sde): rab kyis rnam par dpyod cing / snying rje chen po la dmigs pa 'dzin pa yang 'dud kyi las so// thabs dang mi ldan par dge bar spyod pa thams cad kyang 'dud kyi las so// byang chub
386a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sde snod mi tshol gyi/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa yang bdud kyi las so// mang du thos kyang gzhan gyis shes kyis dog te/ chos la slob dpon dpe' mkhyud
386a4(mdo sde): byed pa yang bdud kyi las so/ / 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa'i zhal ta byed cing mang du thos pa'i mi tshol ba yang 'dud kyi las so// byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba theg pa chen po la yang dag par
386a5(mdo sde): zhugs pa bskal pa nyam pa rnams la mi rten/ mi snyen/ bsnyen bkur mi byed kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ skal ba mi mnyam pa la dga'
386a6(mdo sde): ba yang bdud kyi las so/ / gang gi tshe brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba'am/ rgyal po 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gi longs spyod dang / nor dang / rin po che
386a7(mdo sde): dang / dbang phyug gi che ba nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe/ chos kyi che ba nyid dang ldan pa rnams la mi sten/ mi snyen/ bsnyen bkur mi byed pa 'di dag ni/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
386b1(mdo sde): bdud kyi las yang dag phul nyi shu'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la sdig can khyod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las 'di dag legs par bshad pa ni leg
386b2(mdo sde): so legs so zhes/ legs so zhes bya ba byin no// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdud kyi las 'di rnams thos shing / thos nas kyang rnam par spong pa de dag/ byang chub yongs
386b3(mdo sde): su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu thob par 'gyur ro/ / nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i
386b4(mdo sde): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bskal ba mnyam
386b5(mdo sde): pa dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa shes pa dang / chos ma thos pa nyan/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems
386b6(mdo sde): mngon du 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung ba brnyed pa dang / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa dang / thabs dang shes rab
386b7(mdo sde): kyi shes pas sems can bsdus shing / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / g.yo med cing sgyu ma med pa dang / phongs pa'i dngos po thams cad yod
387a1(mdo sde): su gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa ste/ byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i tha/
387a2(mdo sde): mtshams bzangs kyi bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba ni/ sdig can khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do//
387a3(mdo sde): bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di la kho bo snyed bsnyed ci zhig legs par rnyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi gang 'byung po babs pas bstan pa de ni/ mi den
387a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ de ni 'byung po de'i 'gyur bar blta'o// lha'i bu de bzhin du kho bo yang 'jam dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs nas ston gyi/ 'di kho bo'i skyes bus stsal du mi blta'o//
387a5(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can khyod/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan zhing / chos ston pas
387a6(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur tam/ bdud kyis smras pa/ khyod kyi ni kho bo brgyan par mthong ba lta na/ kho bo ni cing ba dam pos bdag brjid par shes so// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ 'jam
387a7(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ bzod pa gsol cig dang / de nas gtong bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gyi byin gyi rlabs gyis/ bdud kyi lha'i mtshams bzangs la 'di
387b1(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la bzod par gsol mi dgos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
387b2(mdo sde): de bdag la 'khrug pa med/ khro ba med pa'i phyir ro// gang dag 'khrug cing khro ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol dgos so// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod
387b3(mdo sde): pa ci 'dra/ bdud kyi smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ni/ rnam pa bcu gnyis te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcos ma ma yin pas bsam pa'i
387b4(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi slu bas/ g.yo ba med pa'i bzod pa dang / dbul zhing phongs pa yongs
387b5(mdo sde): su skyob pas snang brtse zhing snying rje ba'i bzod pa dang / ldog pa med pas/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i bzod pa dang / lta bar song ba dang bral bas/ stong pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang / chos
387b6(mdo sde): nyes la rton pas chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang / bdag med pas zab mo'i bzod pa dang / 'phags skye bo'i rjes su 'jug pas 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
387b7(mdo sde): dang 'thun pas yang dag pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung bas ngo byed pa yang med la mi mthun pa'ang med pa'i bzod pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob
388a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ skye ba med cing 'byung ba med cing bzod pa ste/ lha'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis so// lha'i bus smras pa/
388a2(mdo sde): sdig can khyod gal te bkrol na/ dga' bar 'gyur ram/ bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo dga' ste/ mchog tu dga'o// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs kyis/ 'jam dpal
388a3(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal bdud sdig can thong shig/ rang gi gnas su 'gro'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad
388a4(mdo sde): ces smras so/ / sdig can khyod su zhig gis bcings/ gang las dgrol/ bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag ni sus bcings mi shes so// 'jam dpal gyi smras pa/ sdig
388a5(mdo sde): can khyod ji ltar bcangs pa med pa la bcing bar 'du shes pa de bzhin du/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes/ bdag med
388a6(mdo sde): pa la bdag tu 'du shes/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes/ gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed rnams med pa dang / rnam par
388a7(mdo sde): shes pa med pa la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes so// sdig can khyod dgrol na gang nas dgrol/ bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag ni gang las
388b1(mdo sde): kyang mi dgrol lo/ / smras pa/ sdig can de bzhin du gang dag rnam par dgrol ba yang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes yongs su shes pa ma gtogs par/ gang las kyang rnam par grol
388b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba med de/ de dag yongs su shes pas rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byin gyis brlabs de bsdus pa dang / sdig can de'ang rang gi gzug
388b3(mdo sde): dang ldan par bdag gi shes so/ / de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po bdud sdig can la 'di skad smras so// sdig can khyod kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas pa legs so legs so// bdud
388b4(mdo sde): kyi smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po 'di ni kho bo ni yul ma yin gyis/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yul du blta'o// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
388b5(mdo sde): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon
388b6(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir ba med na/ sangs rgyas kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste/
388b7(mdo sde): dper na/ gal te sems can rnams na bar ma gyur na/ sman pas kyang bya'am 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lha'i bu sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir bar ma gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad
389a1(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang byung na sangs rgyas 'byung / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi 'byung na/
389a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag spang ba'i don du sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub
389a3(mdo sde): brnyes nas/ chos skyed pa de gang chos bkag pa de gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas/ chos gang yang bskyed pa yang med/ bkag pa
389a4(mdo sde): yang med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni skye ba ma yin/ 'gag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang
389a5(mdo sde): bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
389a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ gang dmigs pa'i lta bas chos gang la yang kun du mi spyod pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
389a7(mdo sde): gang nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang nyon
389b1(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad kyang 'dor la/ sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mi gtong ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin//
389b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ji ltar ston pas bstan pa bzhin du sgrub cing / sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims la 'god la lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor ba'o// /
389b3(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang chos thams cad shin tu zad pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas/
389b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi gnod sems dang / khro ba dang tha ba spang ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi cho ga mi 'dor ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson
389b5(mdo sde): 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos gang gi phyir/ brtson 'grus rtson pa'i chos de ni/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
389b6(mdo sde): baba'i byang chub te/ de nyid shin tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ sems can thams cad kyis le lo spang ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus gces pa yang mi 'dor ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/
389b7(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par shes kyang / sems
390a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir yang bsam gtan byed pa na'o/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin/
390a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rgyu ba med pa thob par gyur te/ spros pa thams cad dang bral zhing / sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spang ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyis rnam par spyod pa
390a3(mdo sde): na ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smos
390a4(mdo sde): pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal
390a5(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
390a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la dga' ba yang mi skyes la/ mi dga' ba yang ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ 'jam
390a7(mdo sde): dpal gyis sbas pa/ nam chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral bar gyur pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa zhes bya/ 'jam
390b1(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur byung ba med par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin/ 'jam
390b2(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi mchos
390b3(mdo sde): yin/ 'jam dpral gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad gzung ba med pa dang / bzhi med par shes par na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gocha
390b4(mdo sde): chen po dgos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par thos nas/ mi dngang / mi skrag/ skrag par
390b5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur zhing / go cha chen po mi 'dor ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nges pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam snying rje chen pos sems
390b6(mdo sde): can thams cad ring du srid pa ma yin la/ srid pa'i bag la nyal gyi nye bar bsnyen pa yang ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba yin//
390b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs pas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
391a1(mdo sde): dpa' bka' blo 'de ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub cing / tshig ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras
391a2(mdo sde): paji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'thun par 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rang gi sems dang 'thun pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi bsgo ba las mi 'gyur
391a3(mdo sde): zhing sems can thams cad dang 'thun par gnas pa'o/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpa
391a4(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ nam sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ nang du yang nye bar zhi la phyi rol du rgyu ba la yang rgyu ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
391a5(mdo sde): dpa' dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chags pa thams cad la yang spyod la/ chags pa thams cad la zhen pa yang med pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang
391a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mdza' ba bstan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo
391a7(mdo sde): ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gson pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byas pa shes pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
391b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ nam theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa nyung ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rang gi nyon mongs pa narma
391b2(mdo sde): kyang mi 'dod la/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams spang par yang 'dod pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga shes pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
391b3(mdo sde): pa/ nam 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi shes pas/ chos gang yang mi len pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngoms pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam 'jig
391b4(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'i shes rab la yang gnas la/ 'jig rten pa'i rgyu bas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dben pa
391b5(mdo sde): yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis kyang / kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir/ brtson par yang
391b6(mdo sde): snang ba na'o/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems ma dpa' rang dga' rang drabang can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam zag pa med pa'i lus kyis sangs rgyas kyis
391b7(mdo sde): zhing thams cad du snang ste/ ye shes kyi dbang byed kyi/ nyon mongs pas dbang byed pa ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
392a1(mdo sde): pa/ nam bdag nyid kyang ma thos pa'i chos nyan cing // gzhan la yang ma thos pa'i chos thos par byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la
392a2(mdo sde): brtson pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ na pa dmigs pa thams cad las 'byung ba rab tu shes kyang / chos thams cad 'phros par yang mi byed/ mi 'phros par yang mi byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras
392a3(mdo sde): pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam gzhan dang 'brel ba'i rnam par rig pa mi skyed cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyad
392a4(mdo sde): pa dben par yang rtog la/ rang gi sems kyi spyod pa la yang mi lta zhing / bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas sgrub pa snying por byed pa ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar nabyang chub sems
392a5(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' thos pa thams cad kyang 'dzin la/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnams la
392a6(mdo sde): yang mtshungs par rab tu 'byed cing / / sgra skad brag cha dang / mtshungs par shes nas/ mngon par zhen pa med pa na ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de
392a7(mdo sde): nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa'i don 'di sus kun shes par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag
392b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes banyen gyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/ sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dmigs pa med par spyod pa de dag gis/ kho bos bshad pa'i don 'di kun shes par
392b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ de dag cil mos par 'gyur/ bsam pa ni gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ de dag ni zab mo la mos par 'gyur te/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa ni bsam pa'o// lha'i bu/
392b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nam dge slong 'jig tshogs la lta ba ngo bo nyid kyis/ bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam du skom ste/
392b4(mdo sde): gnyis su med pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid du mnyam par shes shing / ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa las 'byung ba yang tshol la/
392b5(mdo sde): ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa las 'byung ba la so sor rtog pa na/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol bar shes pa na ste/ de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga
392b6(mdo sde): rgyal med pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang nam dge slong 'dod chags kyi mtha' la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / 'dod chag dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang 'dod chags su shes pa dang /
392b7(mdo sde): zhe sdang gi mtha' la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang zhe sdang du shes pa dang / gti mug gi mtha' la gti mug dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / gti mug
393a1(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang gti mug tu 'du shes pa na ste/ de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang nam dge slong sdug bsngal yongs su shes
393a2(mdo sde): par mi byed/ kun 'byung ba spong bar mi byed/ 'gog pa la mngon sum du mi byed/ lam bsgom par yang mi byed/ sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rje su rtogs te/ sdug bsnga
393a3(mdo sde): mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la kun 'byung ba gang yang med/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la/ 'gog pa gang yang med/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la/ lam gang yang med pa
393a4(mdo sde): de ltar dge slong tshul bzhin yid la brtson pa ni chos gang yang skyed par mi byed/ 'gag par yang mi byed/ gnas par yang mi byed do// gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa de 'dus
393a5(mdo sde): ma byas pa'o/ / 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin yang 'phags pa rnams kyi bden par bsgom pa ste/ lha'i bu de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/
393a6(mdo sde): gdong mchi mas gang zhing mchims parnangs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras so// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de na/ bdud rnams kyi skabs med do// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyu
393a7(mdo sde): bde dag gis bdud kyi las thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras nas/ bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yid la bcags bzhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i bu 'od
393b1(mdo sde): mang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa'i don ji ltar bdag gis shes pa lta na/ de nas lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul zab mo 'di thos nas song
393b2(mdo sde): ba'i dge slong de dag gi rab tu byung ba med do/ / bsnyen par rdzogs pa med do// lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'dis skrag par 'gyur ba'i khyim pa de dag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa ma
393b3(mdo sde): yin no/ / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen pa gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos nas/ mi skrag mi dang nga la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / mos
393b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ dge slong ngag
393b5(mdo sde): dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dang nga la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba
393b6(mdo sde): nyid du rig par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang / bzod pa 'dis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
393b7(mdo sde): thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ / lha'i bu 'od mang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzungs par gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
394a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig/ bdud 'dul ba'i le'u bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
394a2(mdo sde): de skad ces bskul nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu 'od mang po dang // thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang
394a3(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// /
394a4(mdo sde): rgyag gyi mkhan pa shI len dra 'o d+he dang / 'dzin mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba b+han d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur ci banus te/ skad gsar rab chad kyis bcos nas gtan la ba'ang/
394a5(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bany+dzu shrI bi hA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas
394a6(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi
394a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phye 'phred kyi dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/
394b1(mdo sde): 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa chag cing / dge slong lnga brgya po thams cad kyi gnas khang nas gnas khang du byung
394b2(mdo sde): steganas brtan shA ri'i bu'i gnas khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas/
394b3(mdo sde): gnas brtan byed par mthong ngo // mthong nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod bsam gtan byed dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// 'jam
394b4(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod nyon mongs pa spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te mi spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i
394b5(mdo sde): bu khyod 'das pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te da ltar byung ba la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod
394b6(mdo sde): gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod mig la gnas
394b7(mdo sde): te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te sgra
395a1(mdo sde): / dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams la gnas te bsam ga tun byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on tegs
395a2(mdo sde): kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod nang la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te phyi rol la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ 'on te/
395a3(mdo sde): phyi nang la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod lus la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te sems la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar
395a4(mdo sde): tshe 'di la bde bar gnas bya ba dang / brjed pa med par gnas par bya ba'i phyir te/ de lta bu'i phyir bsam gtan byed do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas
395a5(mdo sde): pa'am/ tshe 'di ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa'am/ brjed pa med pa'i chos de dag dramigs sam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa 'am/
395a6(mdo sde): 'di ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa'i chos de dag yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhing mi dmigs mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas/ nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i
395a7(mdo sde): chos su gsungs pa gang yin pa de la bdag rten cing gnas so/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas/ nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i chos su gsungs
395b1(mdo sde): pa gang yin na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang la rten cing gnas/ shA ra'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la dge slong ni 'das pa la rten cing gnas so// ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas so// da ltar byung
395b2(mdo sde): ba la brten cing gnas so/ / de bzhin du sbyar te sems kyi bar la rten cing gnas par khong du chud par bya ste/ 'jam dpal chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben par gsungs pa
395b3(mdo sde): yin te/ bdag chos de dag la rten cing gnas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir 'di skad ces 'das pa la rten cing gnas/ ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/ da ltar byung ba
395b4(mdo sde): rten cing rab tu dben pa la gnas pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te sems kyi bar la gnas shing / rab tu dben pa la gnas zhes smra/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang yod pa
395b5(mdo sde): ma yin/ gang ma 'ongs pa de bzhin nyid de yang yod pa ma yin/ gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de yang yod pa ma yin te/ de ltar chos de dag ni yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bu de 'di skad ces
395b6(mdo sde): 'das pa la rten cing gnas/ ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/ da ltar byung ba la rten cing gnas shes smras/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos la ni gnas pa med do// yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang
395b7(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ci yang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang gi yang ma yin/ gang la yang mi gnas te gang mi gnas pa de'i gnas dmigs su med
396a1(mdo sde): do/ / yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ces brjod cing kun tu gnas nas smra ba de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur
396a2(mdo sde): ba 'debs pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni g.yo ba med pa/ rlom sems med pa/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni nyams pa med pa'o// 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni stong pa'o// mtshan ma med
396a3(mdo sde): pa'o/ / smon pa med pa'o// yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang dmigs su med/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang dmigs su med/ gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhi
396a4(mdo sde): nyid de yang dmigs su med pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid de yang dmigs su med do// 'on kyang btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par gang bstan pa 'am
396a5(mdo sde): rab tu bshad par nus pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs nas chos ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
396a6(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos kyang yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
396a7(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/ chos thams cad kyang yod pa ma yin te//
396b1(mdo sde): dmigs su med/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang yod pa ma yin te/ dmigs su med do// de'i chos bstan pa ni 'di 'dra ste/ 'di la dmigs pa 'am/ mi dmigs pa gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba
396b2(mdo sde): med do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa'am/ mi brjod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa yang dag par chad pa/
396b3(mdo sde): btags pa med pa/ gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal su zhig chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
396b4(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu gang 'dus byas kyi khams rnam 'khrugs par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod par yang mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro/ / gang 'das
396b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing / 'das pa'i chos rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing / 'das pa
396b6(mdo sde): dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro// gang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mi
396b7(mdo sde): mthong zhing / de nye bar len par yang mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro// gang bdag dang / bdag med par yang spod par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang len pa dang
397a1(mdo sde): 'dor bar yang spyod par mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur te/ de ni bshad pa 'di'i don kun shes par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
397a2(mdo sde): dpal 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bshad pa 'di'i don shes par 'gyur ba ci zhig yod na/ 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur zhes
397a3(mdo sde): de skad 'dri/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos zab mo bstan pa 'di mngon sum du 'gyur ba nyung / 'di ni yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba nyung ngo // 'jam dpal dgra bcom pa dang / slob
397a4(mdo sde): pa dang / mi slobs pa rnams kyang sa phyogs 'di la sgyid lug par gyur na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa rnam la na
397a5(mdo sde): sa med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa yang med na/ sa gang la dgra bcom pa gnas par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni gnas med pas rab tu phye ba'o// dgra bcom pa dag ni dmig
397a6(mdo sde): su med pas rab tu phye'o/ / dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang mi brjod pa shin tu chad pas rab tu phye ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang / mi brjod pa yang dag
397a7(mdo sde): bapar chad pa ste/ btags pa med pa'o// dgra bcom pa dag ni sar dbye ba dag dang bral ba/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o// 'jug pa med pa/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ dgra ba
397b1(mdo sde): pa dag ni 'dus ma byas pa/ gnas pa med pa yin na/ ci zhig dgra bcom pa dag gi sar 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no// byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni
397b2(mdo sde): ming dang gzugs la rnam par rtog go/ ming dang gzugs de yang rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med par dgra bcom pa rnams kyis shes te/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa dgra ni ming dang / gzugs
397b3(mdo sde): kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no/ / byis pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/ byis pa'i chos dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs so// nam mi dmigs pa de ni mi rtog
397b4(mdo sde): go/ kun tu mi spyod do// de spyod pa med spros pa med cing nye bar zhi ste yod do zhes khas mi len/ med do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ yod kyang yod la med kyang med do zhes khas mi len/ yod pa
397b5(mdo sde): yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin zhes de skad kyang khas mi len to/ / nam khas mi len pa de na dmigs pa med do// de dmigs pa thams cad dang bral bas/ sems med cing sems dang bral
397b6(mdo sde): te/ gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis dge slong gi chos la gnas pa zhes bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de'i dge slong lnga brgya po stan
397b7(mdo sde): las langs nas/ 'di skad ces 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi blta'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi mnyan to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gang na gnas pa'i
398a1(mdo sde): phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ston pa mngon sum du gyur pa bzhin du/ kun nas nyon
398a2(mdo sde): mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mtshan nyid gcig tu ston pas/ chos ma yin pa smra'o zhes brjod nas/ de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs
398a3(mdo sde): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod par spyad snyam nas dong ngo / / de nas gnas gartan shA ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal
398a4(mdo sde): khyod 'di ltar sems can rnams kyi chos kun shes par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ dge slong

398a6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa mi blta'o/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi mnyan to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o zhes zer ba de ni/ legs
398a7(mdo sde): so legs so/ / sha ri'i bu dge slong de dag gi tshig de ni legs par smras pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pa ni yod pa ma yin te/ dmigs su med do// gang yod pa
398b1(mdo sde): ma yin te/ dmigs su med pa de la blta ba dang mnyan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal
398b2(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa yod pa ma yin te/ dmigs su med pas/ gang de'i gnas kyang yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med do// gang yod pa yang ma yin te dmigs su med pa de ni bstan par bya ba ma
398b3(mdo sde): yin no/ / de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos pa dang / slar phyogs der log nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
398b4(mdo sde): dpal bdag cag ni ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar mi shes so/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa dge slong dag legs so legs so// de lta bu ni ston pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis bya ba ste/ dge slong dag
398b5(mdo sde): 'di la ni kun shes par bya ba med/ rnam par shes par bya ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa nyid do// chos kyi dbyings gang yin
398b6(mdo sde): pa de dbyings ma yin no/ / de ni yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med cing / g.yo ba med la 'chi 'pho med do// gang g.yo ba med cing 'chi 'pho med pa de kun shes par bya ba ma yan/ rnam par shes
398b7(mdo sde): bar bya ba ma yin no/ / gang kun shes par bya ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba'i rlom sems med pa de ni ston pa'i nyan thos zhes bya/ mchog thob pa zhes bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ sbyin gnas zhes bya'o//
399a1(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag las/ dge slong bzhi brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong brgya ni sems cher
399a2(mdo sde): 'khrugs nas/ lus de nyid dang / sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du lhung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod sems
399a3(mdo sde): can rjes su bsrung ba'i chos mi ston pas/ dge slong brgya po de dag chud zos te/ mtshar byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i
399a4(mdo sde): bu khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu dge slong brgya po de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod der reg pa thang cig reg nas/ dgel ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye
399a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu gal te dge slong de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos su zin na/ de dag gdon mi za ba sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ las de zad nas mir skye bar 'gyur
399a6(mdo sde): ba zhig na/ de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten pas/ bskal par sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de yang cung zad cig myong bar byas so// shA ri'i bu de'i phyir/ dge slong
399a7(mdo sde): brgya po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog ma 'dus par dgra bcom pa zag pa zad par 'gyur ro/ / sha ri'i bu de lta bas na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di som nyid dang bcas
399b1(mdo sde): pas rgyu thos pa ni dam pa yin gyi/ bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs pas ni de lta ma yin/ tshad med pa bzhis ni de lta ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgoms
399b2(mdo sde): pas ni de lta ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu de ma thos par 'khor ba las yongs su ma grol/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
399b3(mdo sde): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams yongs su ma grol zhes bshad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ce
399b4(mdo sde): smras so/ / 'jam dpal 'di ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad pa ngo mtshar to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
399b5(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ni bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// sems can gyi khams kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// kun nas
399b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med de/ tha snyad tsam du zad pas ci yang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin//
399b7(mdo sde): gang la yang mi gnas te gnas pa med do// btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'di lta bu'i mi 'gal ba de ni byang chub po// byang chub gang yin pa de ni thar pa'o// thar pa gang yin pa de rnam par mi rtog
400a1(mdo sde): go gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni mi byed cing 'gyur ba med do/ / gang mi byed cing 'gyur ba med pa de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
400a2(mdo sde): gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ji skad bstan pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid ni bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// chos kyi dbyi
400a3(mdo sde): kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// sems can gyi khams kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
400a4(mdo sde): de dag yod pa ma yin zhing / dmigs su med de/ tha snyad tsam du zad pas ci yang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang la yang mi gnas te/ gnas pa med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
400a5(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang // da ltar byung ba'i chos brjod pas// don gyi ma yin tha snyad tsam// gcig dang sna tshogs mtshan nyid min//
400a6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid med par gang rtog pa// de dag nyid ni mtshan nyid 'gyur// mtshan nyid med la rtog pa med// rtog pa nyid sdang mtshan nyid min// 'dus ma byas la gang rtog dang // mya ngan 'das la gang
400a7(mdo sde): rtog pa/ / gnyis ka bdud kyi las yin zhes// de ni mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad// phung po skye mched khams kyi rnams// de dag ming gis brjod pa ste// ming dang skye mched gang yin pa// /
400b1(mdo sde): de gnyis mtshan nyid gcig pa yin// tshul bzhin la ni gang rtog pa// de nyid tshul bzhin ma yin no// mkhas pa cung zad mi rtog ste// stong pa ji bzhin spyod yul lo// gang dag rtog pa de dag
400b2(mdo sde): g.yo/ / rtog pa med pa g.yo ba med// rtog pa rnams kyis g.yo bar 'gyur// rtog pa med par mya ngan 'da'// gang gis rang bzhin 'di shes pa// de ni ye shes ldan zhes bya// de phyir zad pa/
400b3(mdo sde): rjes su thob// de ni rtog med ye shes so// ye shes kyis ni ye shes brjod// ye shes brjod pa rnams kyang gsog/ ye shes 'di ltar gang bzod pa// de ni ye shes ldan zhes bya// gang gis stong/
400b4(mdo sde): gsum 'di dag rnams// rin chen bkang ste byin pa bas// gang gis dam chos 'di 'dra la// bzod pa de ni bzod pa'i mchog/ bskal pa bye ba'i bsam yas su// sbyin dang tshul khrims
400b5(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / / brtson 'grus bsam gtan bsnyen pas ni// mdo sde 'di dang mtshungs ma yin// chos 'di dang ni theg pa 'di// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs// mdo sde 'di
400b6(mdo sde): la rten byas na/ / thams cad de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/ dge
400b7(mdo sde): slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khrani bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad
401a1(mdo sde): bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba la/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar de bzhin gsheg
401a2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog ces bya bar ming 'thun par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
401a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bston
401a4(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / // zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
401a5(mdo sde): phab pa/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bany+dza shri ni rde sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ 'od skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya ba theg
401a6(mdo sde): pa chen po'i mdo/ / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na// rgyal
401a7(mdo sde): burgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tham pa dang thabs cig tu
401b1(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rin po che'i gdugs dpag
401b2(mdo sde): tshad bcu 'khor ba tsam thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng gi drang thad na 'dzin cing 'dug go// de nas yongs su dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu mtshams bzang shrI bya ba bla na med
401b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog pa 'khor dang bcas te/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa stan las langs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song
401b4(mdo sde): nas phyin pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa mdzad pas/ da dung thugs mtsham lags sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
401b5(mdo sde): pa lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rgya mtsho chen po chu zed pas chog par 'dzin par 'gyur snyam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
401b6(mdo sde): bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho chen po lta bu zab cing gting dpag dka' la dpag tu med pa yongs su tshol bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ /
401b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas/ gzhan yang chog par 'dzin par mi bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa
402a1(mdo sde): bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dmigs pa bzhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems
402a2(mdo sde): la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba la dmigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas
402a3(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la dmigs pa ste/ lha'i bu dmigs pa bzhi po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis de
402a4(mdo sde): skad ces smras nas/ lha'i bu'i bu mtshams bzangs dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang
402a5(mdo sde): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ 'jab dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod do//
